Big Picture what is happening¶

What exactly do you thinking is happening? Who is doing what to who? Why are they doing this? https://www.reddit.com/r/LockdownCriticalLeft/comments/mzv090/what_exactly_do_you_thinking_is_happening_who_is/gw46zxu/

Pandemic Preparedness¶

Control of Communicable Diseases - A Proposed Rule by the Health and Human Services Department on 08/15/2016 - https://www.federalregister.gov/documents/2016/08/15/2016-18103/control-of-communicable-diseases

Gain of Function¶

2004 PubMed: Need link Immunization with SARS coronavirus vaccines leads to pulmonary immunopathology on challenge with the SARS virus

Session 3: What is the debate on the potential risks and benefits of GOF research?

  • Posted by Gain of Function Symposium Dec 24, 2014

  • Yoshihiro Kawaoka discusses the key issues on benefits that need to be addressed in the assessments the NIH will undertake, while David Relman discusses the key issues on risks.

  • https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=z5BJ5yBjShQ&ab_channel=GainofFunctionSymposium

Fauci and Wuhan and Daszak images https://twitter.com/ThomasConnors/status/1387296845089714179

Medical Effects of RNA Based Vaccines and the Risk of Prion Disease https://scivisionpub.com/pdfs/covid19-rna-based-vaccines-and-the-risk-of-prion-disease-1503.pdf

How COVID-19 is diagnosed: bacterium assisted DNA searching https://berthub.eu/articles/posts/dna-grep-2019-ncov/

Isolation and purification of COVID19 SARS-COV-2¶

Isolation and purification of COVID19 SARS-COV-2 https://www.fluoridefreepeel.ca/fois-reveal-that-health-science-institutions-around-the-world-have-no-record-of-sars-cov-2-isolation-purification/

Vaccine Ingredients¶

Reverse Engineering the source code of the BioNTech/Pfizer SARS-CoV-2 Vaccine https://berthub.eu/articles/posts/reverse-engineering-source-code-of-the-biontech-pfizer-vaccine/

Knowledge Management¶

The data of long lived institutions - There’s no scenario that I’ve seen where the world population doesn’t start going down by at least a hundred years from now, if not less than 50 years from now. https://blog.longnow.org/02020/10/21/the-data-of-long-lived-institutions/

Innovation Wiki https://innowiki.org/category/innovations/innovation-type-communication-enabler/

Webmaster SEO Search¶

SEO How to submit a site to Yahoo https://kinsta.com/blog/submit-website-to-search-engines/#how-do-i-submit-my-website-to-yahoo

Bing Robots.txt tester https://www.bing.com/webmasters/robotstxttester https://www.bing.com/webmasters/help/robotstxt-tester-623520ca

Google Sitemaps https://developers.google.com/search/docs/advanced/sitemaps/build-sitemap

GPS Direction Finding Location Finding¶
